io.github.jonestimd.swing.window

Class StatusFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • io.github.jonestimd.swing.window.StatusFrame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StatusIndicator, UnsavedChangesIndicator, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class StatusFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements StatusIndicator, UnsavedChangesIndicator
    This class extends JFrame to disable user input and provide progress messages during long running processes. It also uses SettingsPersister to store state when the window is closed.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
